mapper.insert: insert into bcc_member (id, pw, user_name, email, tel, zip, address1, address2) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{user_name}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{zip}, #{address1}, #{address2})
mapper.select: select * from bcc_member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.delete: delete from bcc_member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM bcc_member WHERE id = #{id}
